text: Omar Daoud (9 April 1983 – 9 May 2018) was a Libyan international footballer. He was best known for playing as a defender for the Libyan Premier League club Ahly Tripoli and Algerian JS Kabylie.Omar Daoud - goalzz.com He died on 9 May 2018 in a car accident near his home town Shahhat, Libya. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Libyan footballers Category:Libyan expatriate footballers Category:Libya international footballers Category:2006 Africa Cup of Nations players Category:JS Kabylie players Category:Expatriate footballers in Algeria Category:Libyan expatriate sportspeople in Algeria Category:Al-Ahli SC (Tripoli) players Category:Association football defenders Category:Road incident deaths in Libya
title: Omar Daoud
